description: This file defines a function to instantiate an AI agent with weather-related tools, wraps it in a performance evaluation, and runs the evaluation if executed as the main module.

classes.name: PerformanceEval
classes.description: A class used to evaluate the performance of a function over multiple iterations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent with tools and prompts.

methods.name: instantiate_agent
methods.description: Creates and returns an AI agent configured with a system prompt and a weather tool.
